Subject: Service Account Password Questions
Description:
1. Can StealthAUDIT call to an API to plugin the password in Password Vault?
2. Where is the password being updated on the system? (i.e. services, task, xml file, etc)
Solution_Comment__c:
Discussed where the passwords for NEA, NAM, AIC, NTM, and NTP are. We currently have a cyberark integration for NEA that the customer may leverage since that is their current password vault provider. We also submitted feature requests to have a cyberark integration added to NAM, NTM, and NTP.

Also provided the customer with a copy of the Password Change guide I built for them with the various places in their environment a password needs changed (attached to SF Account under Related)
